ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So they turned their backs on him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But they turned their backs on him and went away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So turning their backs, they went away from him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: All the people turned away from him
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they turned their backs on him and went away. (The pagans thought he would transmit the disease).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So they turned away from him and departed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So they went away from him, turning back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But they went away from him, turning their backs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they turned their backs and went away from him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so they turned their backs on him and went off.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So they departed from him turning their backs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So they went away leaving him behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So they turned away from him, and departed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So they turned away from him, and departed (for fear of the disease).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But they turned their backs and went away from him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But they turned their backs on him, and went away.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So they turned away from him, departing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:90] So they went away, to their festival, leaving him behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they turned their backs and went away from him) they went to their festival and left him alone.
